H0.text: In which decade did stereo records first go on sale. 1940s

H1.text: In which decade did stereo records first go on sale. 1950s

H2.text: In which decade did stereo records first go on sale. 1960s

H3.text: In which decade did stereo records first go on sale. '30s

A4.text: Columbia released its first pop stereo albums in the summer of 1958.

A5.text: Although Columbia began recording in stereo in 1956, stereo LPs did not begin to be manufactured until 1958.
